      • addToFunctionPanel

        public void addToFunctionPanel(java.awt.Component c,
                               java.lang.String title)
        Adds a component to this 'function panel' which is added to the right of this split area.

        The 'function panel' has a border layout in whose center the specified component is added. The specified title is shown in a panel at the north.

        Parameters:
        c - the Component that is added to the right of this plit window
        title - the title for the function

      • showToolbar
